name: Nalgene MEC Crest Widemouth Bottle
description: Show off your MEC love. This bottle features a wide mouth that’s great for adding ice cubes, swabbing out the insides, and easy opening in colder conditions.Made of Tritan™ co-polyester.Loop top allows clipping onto packs, and lets you flip your lid, without losing it.Standard 63mm threaded opening fits water filters and other accessories.
